response.overview: WhatsApp presents: “Push, Push” with Lewis Hamilton.  After his victory in Silverstone, we invited 7-time world champion Lewis Hamilton of Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS F1 Team to sit down with a few teens to share the lessons that he’s learned on his journey. From issues in school with dyslexia, escaping through go-karting, finding his place on the global stage and fighting back to the top after a 945-day drought, he reminds us that no matter where you’re trying to go, you’ll get there if you go together. Presented by WhatsApp.
response.title: Push, Push with Lewis Hamilton
